questionTitle: The customs officer made her ________ her suitcase.
My doctor will not let me ________ animal fats any more.
Barbara: It's curious that Roy can't ski better. Leo: I know. By the end of the month, he ________ lessons for a full month.
________ the terrible weather, the tennis tournament was cancelled.
The plate was right on the ________ of the table and could have been knocked off at any moment.
Scientists had never met this problem before: it was ________.
I was ________ about to ring up the office when he arrived home.
We would ________ to stay at home this evening.
We had to ________ our roof repaired after the violent storm.
I'm afraid it didn't ________ my mind that they weren't the right people to invite.
The child hurt himself badly when he fell ________ the bedroom window.
The hardest thing I ________ to do was to look after some children for a week.
He has had a bad day - in addition ________ being late for school, he forgot his homework.
After a lot of difficulty, he ________ to open the door.
Don't lean ________ that wall! You'll regret it.
It was very kind ________ him.
The production ________, we suffered considerable losses lately.
After his uncle's death, my husband ________ a lot of money.
The police are looking for a man of ________ height.
As dumb as ________ = stupid.
